ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of CAROL HANSELL of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada to hold office, during good behaviour, for a term ending February 28, 2012, effective March 1, 2009.
